name: Conference Management App
description: A conference management app built with Lightning Web Components Open Source

SALESFORCE_CLIENT_ID.description: Consumer key from your Salesforce Connected App

SALESFORCE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Consumer secret from your Salesforce Connected App

SALESFORCE_CALLBACK_URL.description: Callback URL used by your Salesforce Connected App

NODE_SESSION_SECRET_KEY.description: A random string used to secure your server sessions
